name: AuraLabs
0:
”Alexa, turn on Aura Smart TV Backlight”
”Alexa, turn on the Aura TV Backlight”
”Alexa, change the Aura TV Backlight to Blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can control your Aura devices from any Alexa enabled device by saying "Alexa, turn on the Aura TV Backlight". The skill also allows you to change the brightness and color of the light.

Before you get started, please make sure your Aura device is online and updated to the latest firmware. Then, enable the Aura Labs skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Aura Labs Skill". 

Some example commands are "Alexa, turn on my Aura TV Backlight or "Alexa, change my Aura TV Backlight to Blue". 

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:

Echo Show
Echo Spot
FireTV Stick Gen 2
FireTV Gen 2
FireTV 4K Gen 3
FireTV Cube
Fire Tablet 7 or higher

Notes: 
FireTV Stick Gen 1 - Not supported
